psychotherapy.title: Psychotherapy
psychotherapy.body: A long-term process that helps you gain deeper self-awareness, recognize behavioral patterns, and change them.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.body: Short-term support focused on solving specific problems. Helps to overcome crisis situations.

session-reservation.title: Session reservation
session-reservation.body: A convenient way to book your first or follow-up appointment online. Consultations take place in a cozy setting.

aboutme.title: Sandra Jatulytė a psychotherapist
aboutme.about1: I am your psychotherapist, with many years of experience helping people discover inner peace and a deeper understanding of themselves. The essence of my work is to create a safe space where you can openly talk about your experiences and emotions.
aboutme.about2: Your psychotherapist with many years of experience helping people discover inner peace and a deeper understanding of themselves. The essence of my work is to create a safe space.
